title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item on first attempt in library outline view
description:
Description: When using the library outline view, it is observed that no item can be selected on the first attempt.

OB: No item can be selected on the first attempt in the library outline view.

EB: The second time a label item is selected, it should be possible to select it.

SR: 
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select any item.
3. Notice that the item cannot be selected.
4. Select the same item for the second time and observe that it can now be selected.
